item.title: Cats Show
item.description: You can tell I’m not looking to write something serious by the topic I’ve chosen ðŸ˜› The first time I read about Show I instantly said to my self “its just a glorified toString”. I still struggle to see the difference… Okay not really but they are pretty similar. Backing up, Here is the signature of show: /** creates an instance of [[Show]] using the provided function */ def show[A](f: A => String): Show[A] = new Show[A] { def show(a: A): String = f(a) } So it takes a A as a type parameter and a function that takes an A and transforms it to a String.
